---
title: "Drafts for testing stuff"
---

```{r}
rm(list=ls())
## 1: prepare test problem
library(smoof)
ZDT1 <- make_vectorized_smoof(prob.name  = "ZDT1", 
                              dimensions = 3)

## 2: set input parameters
problem   <- list(name  = "ZDT1",xmin = rep(0, 3), xmax = rep(1, 3), m = 2)
decomp    <- list(name  = "SLD", H = 9)
neighbors <- list(name  = "lambda", T = 3, delta.p = 1)
aggfun    <- list(name  = "wt")
variation <- list(
              list(name = "sbx",     etax = 20, pc = 1),
              list(name = "polymut", etam = 20, pm = 0.1))
update    <- list(name  = "restricted", nr = 1)
scaling   <- list(name  = "none")
repair    <- list(name  = "truncate")
stopcrit  <- list(
              list(name = "maxiter", maxiter = 50))
showpars  <- list(show.iters = "numbers", showevery = 10)
```



```{r}
## 3: run MOEA/D
out1 <- moead(problem, decomp,  aggfun, neighbors, variation, 
              update, scaling, repair, stopcrit,  showpars)

# 4: Plot output
plot(out1$Y[,1], out1$Y[,2], type = "p", pch = 20)

```
